helpText:
🤖 **Available Commands:**

• <prefix>ping
- `check if alive or not`

• <prefix>repo
- `show the bot source code`

• <prefix>start | <prefix>help
- `show the help for commands`

• <prefix>mode | <prefix>switch
- `switch the stream mode (audio/video)`

• <prefix>p | <prefix>play [song name | youtube link]
- `play a song in vc, if already playing add to queue`

• <prefix>radio | <prefix>stream [radio url | stream link]
- `play a live stream in vc, if already playing add to queue`

• <prefix>pl | <prefix>playlist [youtube playlist link]
- `play the whole youtube playlist at once`

• <prefix>skip | <prefix>next
- `skip to the next song`

• <prefix>m | <prefix>mute
- `mute the current stream`

• <prefix>um | <prefix>unmute
- `unmute the muted stream`

• <prefix>ps | <prefix>pause
- `pause the current stream`

• <prefix>rs | <prefix>resume
- `resume the paused stream`

• <prefix>list | <prefix>queue
- `show the songs in the queue`

• <prefix>mix | <prefix>shuffle
- `shuffle the queued playlist`

• <prefix>loop | <prefix>repeat
- `enable or disable the loop mode`

• <prefix>lang | language [language code]
- `set the bot language in a group`

• <prefix>ip | <prefix>import
- `import queue from exported file`

• <prefix>ep | <prefix>export
- `export the queue for import in future`

• <prefix>stop | <prefix>leave
- `leave from vc and clear the queue`
